_header: That fasting withouten alms is of might
Note: Attributed to Augustine in the MS.
_description: On fasting — one proverbial couplet translating ‘Tale est ieiunium sine eleemosyna qualis sine oleo lucerna’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þat fastingge withouten elmesse is of mithAs is þe lampe
                    withoten olie & lith
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 20.
